column2: "I can't control it anymore... all of the darker energy I've absorbed..."
"I guess... this is really it. It's all over..."
"Clarissa? Clarissa... please. You know... what to do..."
"You can tell, can't you? It won't be long before I lose my mind..."
"I exist... to exterminate the Darkers. To protect everyone's lives. That is why i live. Ngh--!"
"So rather than become my mortal enemy, I... I would rather..."
"But... it's such a shame. It's so unfair."
"I wanted... you to teach me more. I wanted to finish our conversations."
"I wanted to see what life was like... acting ladylike and cute..."
"Sigh... There was still so much I didn't know, and so much I wanted to do."
"I still don't understand who 'everyone' is... and I don't know if they deserve protection..."
"But if I could have been... by your side..."
"I would have liked to become a normal girl..."
"This surge of power... if I don't act fast, you'll never make it back!"

"I'm pulling you out!
<%me>, stay alert! I have no idea what's going to happen!"
